That was a fine display of discipline and crowd control on the part of the agent. You're told to back up, then you tell the enforcer """"fuck you"""" and instead of being beat to a pulp, you're assisted to the ground in a manner in which you knew without a shadow of a doubt who was running what. Great training tool.
not everyone is as weapon knowledgeable as you, but still have a right to their comments and opinions !

Humans can watch animals on TV as we don't deserve to be close to them because we r incapable of defending ourselves without bullets.
